snippet.title: Vigil: The Longest Night Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Vigil: The Longest Night will be available on PC, Xbox, and PS4 early 2020 and Nintendo Switch later.

You can Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/720560/Vigil_The_Longest_Night/

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/ai
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/vigilthegame
Like our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VigilTheGame/
